project.name: openrc
project.description: The Gentoo OpenRC Project manages Gentoo's initialization scripts system.

longdescription.p: OpenRC is a dependency based init system that works with the system provided init program, normally /sbin/init. It is not a replacement for /sbin/init. OpenRC is 100% compatible with Gentoo init scripts, which means you can probably find one for the daemons you want to start in the Gentoo Portage Tree.

body.p: The Gentoo OpenRC Project is open to all contributions. If you would like to get involved in the project, feel free to join us on irc/#gentoo-base. Or we're reachable via openrc@gentoo.org. However, all bug reports should go through Bugzilla rather than e-mail.
You can also find the source code in the OpenRC git tree.
